sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Wal-Mart Stores ( WMT ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 3.1%.
Year to date, Wal-Mart Stores has lost about 30.5% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Nike ( NKE ), trading down 1.9%.
Nike is showing a gain of 25.9% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Caterpillar ( CAT ), trading down 1.0%, and Home Depot ( HD ), trading up 2.6% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
